sense.def:
The speaker
je oseba, ki govori.

seg.quote: ...the gap between the speaker and the listener.

sense.def:
A speaker
je tudi oseba, ki ima govor.

seg.quote: The chairman got up to introduce the speaker.

sense.def:
A speaker of a particular language
je oseba, ki zna govoriti neki jezik.

seg.quote: Some sounds are very difficult for French speakers of English.

sense.def:
A speaker
je tudi del opreme, na primer radijskega sprejemnika ali glasbenega stolpa, iz katerega prihajajo zvoki.
